column3: Our snack product categories include biscuits & baked snacks, chocolate and gum & candy. During the first quarter of 2022, we realigned some of our products between our biscuits & baked snacks and chocolate categories; as such, we reclassified the product category net revenues on a basis consistent with the 2022 presentation.
The 2023 summarized earnings information is inclusive of KDP only for the period in which we accounted for this investment under the equity method.
